transcript.text: Subtitle begin 1:14
Hi Guys, I hope you are doing well.
It’s a big day today!
Wow I’m shocked by your intro! I was expecting….Yooo whats up guys! Your not going to play with us, you’re going to play Pokémon!
Yeah I’m feeling stressed! Today is a big day!
We here top open the famous “Pokémon Box”..check out this close shot of my hands!
Today I’m with some great people...of course by buddy Inoxtag...would I open the pokémon cards without you?
No way!
And we’re with David Lafarge...the pokémon boss!
It’s a pleasure to be with you!
Thanks Michou, it’s a pleasure to be here to!
David is THE YouTube pokémon expert! We are also with of course Dobby & Seinhor  who got me into Pokémon in the first place
I don’t know about that!

Yeah, senor one day said let’s do a video to open some pokémon boxes and once I started I couldn’t stop! I’m not going to stop but I need to slow down as I really went crazy on this box! Don’t worry guys we’ll be really careful with these cards!
I’m not going to stop but I need to slow down as I really went crazy on this box! Don’t worry guys we’ll be really careful with these cards!
That’s why were here with 2 professionals!
Yes, I’ll present them. We are with David you saw already in the video last week and Tibo...hows it going guys?
We’re ready..
Of course!
You used to it aren’t you?
Yeah but there’s always something special it’s not just a normal pokémon box!
We going to upon some amazing pokémon cards!!!!
I’m not showing much but I’m trembling and in my head I’m like him!
Come on!!!! Open Open the box!!!

Before watching this unboxing video don’t forget to watch the video that came out last week where I explain a little more about the Pokémon collection...that way when you see this unboxing you’ll like it even more!! Are you ready? I’m not!
What can we expect in the box?
In the box you can expect...Tibo can help me explain the rarest cards but you guys know the goal.. The charizard holographic
I’d also like to get Starter Trio…
And I want the Tygnon holographic 70 PV!!
Seriously if have Tygnon holographic 70 PV!! I’ll give it to you!
No I won’t accept any presents from this box! No give to one of the viewers!
I’ll give it to you and then you give it to one of the viewers! They’d be so happy!
So guys... one of the reasons you’re here is because you might be able to help us estimate the grade of the cards
Just to remind you guys….Tibo you brought this right? I’ve got in front of me a card with a grade 10. If the card’s in perfect condition it gets a 10. If there’s a tiny little scratch it would be a 9
Yes a tiny micro scratch and the grade goes down
The goal is not just to get a very rare card but also a card in the best condition….un Charizard 9.5 is worth how much?
9.5 doesn’t exist but a Charizard grade 9 would be worth about 10 000 euros at the moment...and a 10 would be about 45 -50 000 euros
Crazy!!
Just with 1 grade difference!
10 is only for cards in perfect condition..
Exactly
There’s another one I want...The Leveinard grade 10!!! Didn’t you say there’s only 3 Leveinard holographic grade 10??
I think so…
There are 5 cards for me..the 3 starters...Charizard ...Florzn & Tortor….there’s the  Leveinard and the Mutu
Ahhhhh I forgot about the Mutu!
That’s one of my favourites!
Open it open it!!! Wait! We forgot something….the thumbs up!
Guys even for me it”s very rare to spend as much money on a Pokémon box!
That’s a lot of $$$$ for such a small box...the first time that really does something to you!
Well done you did that like a boss!
Do you know how to open it now?
You lift up the top really carefully and you can fold it back
I’d leave it like that
It’s 20 years old, it’s older than you
It’s older than me! Guys let’s put the gloves on. We put the gloves on to not damage the cards! We’re aiming for perfection!
The first one is going to be a Charizard
I want to open perfectly so I want you do it as you’re better at it than me
I can’t feel my hands with the gloves!
Some of the best packs are worth 2 500 euros
Look opened perfectly!
Ok I’ll take a way the first energy card
There will be a 2nd one
1st card...a little Sporifik
Next one 52 of 102..I’m sure they know…
It’s a Roucool…
I recognise the layout
There are 4 important things to know about the cards...the centering, the surface, the corners & the edges and it’s these 4 things that determine the grade.
These guys are going to do an estimation but I think I’ll do another video on my second channel where I send my cards to PSA and see the final grade and compare
For a PSA grade 9 they are about 250 euros and for a grade 10 about 500 euros
What’s this?? A scandal!
Pass it to the experts to see its centered nicely.
The first hologram does something for me!
9 is good you know….
It’s not the centering but you’ve got a lot of scratches from the factory.
It’s impossible...but we could have had 2 Dracofeu?
That’s really exceptional!
I never had that!

2 of the same Holographic! It’s historic in the French edition! The question is...is it in better condition than the first one?
There will be lots of guys from the USA watching!
You’re on a 9 grade because of the silvering...the silver relection on the layer above the hologram
I think it’s a 9
The 10 is really rare
Pikachu could be a 10
Magneton holographic...you beat me! It looks super nice!
Statistically there are 8 holograms left
Wow the first légendaire
Inox you’ve been lucky from the beginning…
They’ve seen the defaults already from the screen
It’s halfway and we’ve got 6 chances left for the holograms
9 is 4000 or 4500 euros if its a 10 its between 18 000 - 22 000 euros
What about the Nidoking…
It’s not a candidate for a 10...The surface is not great...9 will be ok
I don’t know why but your rare ones were in the place of the commun ones
Look at the experts, they’ve seen lots of openings and their shocked
I’ve never seen that, I’ve opened loads of boxes…
No...What?
The Charizard is clean
For me, it's the best holo you have
But, imagine double leviator and magneton glitch the box and they have 2 holographic bonus
I think there’s a hologram
If there’s a hologram it’s crazy!
Worldwide, worldwide  never seen!!!!!
No way there’s an error in the box
This video is going to go around the world!
If the Levenard is a 10 there are only 3 in the world!
Inox..we’ve been opening Pokémon boxes for 20 years...we’ve opened 10’s, 100,000’s of packs opened it’s the first time it’s ever happen.
Even on the box it’s written 12 holograms
The Levinard it’s a candidate for a grade 10
